attributes.action: Banks to give Mortgage payment holiday to victims of the riot
attributes.additional_details: The country came to the assistance of the banks when the industry was collapsing. Victims of the riots who are now homeless from fires caused by rioters should be given a payment holiday for their mortgages till they get on their feet. It is disgusting that people are homeless and the banks (which the public bailed out) have shown no compassion.
